attributes.action: call for independent, impartial, report into the grooming gangs across the UK
attributes.additional_details: If any one is found guilty and not a British citizen they should be returned to their country of origin to serve their sentence and banned from entering Uk again.
attributes.background:
It is time for the government and parliament to call for an independent, impartial, report of all grooming gangs past, present and what can be done to prevent in the future.
Under age girls should be protected by law, and the gangs must face the full force of the law regardless of race or religion.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition:
 
Launch a Public Inquiry into Grooming Gangs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
